p:
Forward and reverse primers were trimmed from the 5′-end of sequences using cutadapt v 1.16
77 . After primer trimming, only sequences with lengths of 147–151 bp in dataset 1 and 230–233 bp in dataset 2 were retained. DADA2 R package v 1.8
78 was used for the remaining bioinformatics with default parameters unless when specified. Sequences were quality trimmed and filtered using the filterAndTrim function: trimming 3′-ends to 147 bp (forward) and 147 bp (reverse) in dataset 1, and 228 bp (forward) and 203 bp (reverse) in dataset 2, and removing sequences if they exceeded a maximum of two expected errors.
